scripts.build-AnnotatedPathwaySearch: vue-cli-service build --mode searchwc --target wc --dest dist/wc/hierarchy/ --name reactome-pathway-hierarchy src/components/WebComponents/AnnotatedPathwayHierarchyWC.vue
scripts.build-InteractorSearch: vue-cli-service build --mode searchwc --target wc --dest dist/wc/interactors/ --name reactome-interactor-search src/components/WebComponents/InteractorSearchWC.vue
scripts.build-production: npm run build && npm run build-AnnotatedPathwaySearch && npm run build-InteractorSearch && mv dist/wc/hierarchy/* dist/wc && mv dist/wc/interactors/* dist/wc && rmdir dist/wc/hierarchy && rmdir dist/wc/interactors && python3 cytoscapeResize.py
